item.description: JANUARY 20 (Sunday) SINGLES WALK & LUNCH at the lovely Walnut Hill Park in New Britain at 11 am. Join us for a brisk walk and then onward to lunch at a local restaurant. There is no charge for walk. You buy your own lunch. For info, call Gail 860-582-8229. Directions: I-84 to 72E or Rt. 9 to 72W, Exit 7 Corbin Ave., take Rt. 372W to 1st light, turn right onto West Main St, at 4th light turn right onto Park Place at Walnut Hill Park sign, go to end, turn right, follow road around to other side of park. We?ll meet in 2nd parking lot.
item.how_to_find_us: I?ll be standing by my car in the parking lot.
item.why: You'll love it because we offer a relaxed, comfortable, welcoming atmosphere for you and other singles to socialize and have fun!

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Singles Walk & Lunch
